name: Underwater
summary_text: A crew of oceanic researchers working for a deep sea drilling company try to get to safety after a mysterious earthquake devastates their deepwater research and drilling facility located at the bottom of the Mariana Trench.

name: Breeders
summary_text: A comedic look at the trials and tribulations of parenthood.

name: Speed
summary_text: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

name: The Girl on the Train
summary_text: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

name: Battleship
summary_text: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

name: Howl's Moving Castle
summary_text: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

name: Possessor
summary_text: Possessor follows an agent who works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.

name: Total Recall
summary_text: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?

name: Tuca & Bertie
summary_text: The story of two 30-year old bird women who live in the same apartment building.

name: The Butterfly Effect
summary_text: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

name: Inspector Lewis
summary_text: Inspector Robert Lewis and Sergeant James Hathaway solve the tough cases that the learned inhabitants of Oxford throw at them.

name: The Sound of Music
summary_text: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to a Naval officer widower's children.

name: Friends with Benefits
summary_text: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

name: The Lobster
summary_text: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.

name: Doctor Doctor
summary_text: A rising heart surgeon's life takes a turn he never expected and soon everything comes crashing down. He soon finds himself a former big city doctor turned small town doctor.

name: The Favourite
summary_text: In early 18th-century England, the status quo at the court is upset when a new servant arrives and endears herself to a frail Queen Anne.

name: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
summary_text: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

name: The Big Sick
summary_text: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

name: The Day After Tomorrow
summary_text: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

name: Lucy
summary_text: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

name: Jessie
summary_text: A Texan teen moves to New York City to follow her dreams and ends up as a nanny for a high profile couple's four children.

name: The Bay
summary_text: Detective Sergeant Lisa Armstrong investigates a missing person in Morecambe Bay.

name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
summary_text: After the loss of their parents in a mysterious fire, the three Baudelaire children face trials and tribulations attempting to uncover dark family secrets.

name: Strike Back
summary_text: Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.

name: The Parent Trap
summary_text: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

name: The OA
summary_text: Having gone missing seven years ago, the previously blind Prairie returns home, now in her twenties with her sight restored. While many believe she is a miracle, others worry that she could be dangerous.

name: Easy A
summary_text: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

name: Manhunt
summary_text: An in-depth look at how an FBI profiler helped track down the terrorist Ted Kaczynski, the Unabomber.

name: Medici
summary_text: A political family drama set in Florence in the early fifteenth century. Cosimo de Medici finds himself at the helm of his banking dynasty when his father, Giovanni, dies suddenly.

name: The House Bunny
summary_text: After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the playboy mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.

name: The Patriot
summary_text: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

name: Legends of the Fall
summary_text: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

name: The Strain
summary_text: A mysterious viral outbreak with hallmarks of an ancient and evil strain of vampirism ravages the city of New York.

name: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
summary_text: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

name: The Last of Us
summary_text: Joel and Ellie, a pair connected through the harshness of the world they live in, are forced to endure brutal circumstances and ruthless killers on a trek across post-pandemic America.

name: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
summary_text: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
summary_text: Holistic detective Dirk Gently investigates cases involving the supernatural.

name: WarGames
summary_text: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

name: Spider-Man 3
summary_text: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

name: Colony
summary_text: In the wake of a mysterious alien invasion, a family fights to stay together in a new world order.

name: Our Friend
summary_text: After receiving life-altering news, a couple finds unexpected support from their best friend, who puts his own life on hold and moves into their family home, bringing an impact much greater and more profound than anyone could have imagined

name: Silver Linings Playbook
summary_text: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: Incendies
summary_text: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

name: Hercules
summary_text: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

name: Secretary
summary_text: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.

name: Henry Danger
summary_text: Looking for a part-time job, 13-year-old Henry Hart finds himself helping super hero Captain Man as his sidekick, keeping the secret from his family and friends.

name: Unbroken
summary_text: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

name: The Newsroom
summary_text: A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.

name: The Passion of the Christ
summary_text: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

name: Rock of Ages
summary_text: A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

name: The Godfather: Part III
summary_text: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

name: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
summary_text: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman runs from his captors, the law, and his past.

name: L.A. Confidential
summary_text: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
summary_text: Three years into the Clone Wars, the Jedi rescue Palpatine from Count Dooku. As Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, Anakin acts as a double agent between the Jedi Council and Palpatine and is lured into a sinister plan to rule the galaxy.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
summary_text: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

name: Taken
summary_text: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

name: The Righteous Gemstones
summary_text: Follows a world-famous televangelist family with a long tradition of deviance, greed, and charitable work.

name: Ash vs Evil Dead
summary_text: Ash has spent the last thirty years avoiding responsibility, maturity, and the terrors of the Evil Dead until a Deadite plague threatens to destroy all of mankind and Ash becomes mankind's only hope.

name: Four Good Days
summary_text: A mother helps her daughter work through four crucial days of recovery from substance abuse.

name: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
summary_text: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaiian vacation in order to deal with the recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know, Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex - and she's bringing along her new boyfriend.

name: Home Alone
summary_text: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

name: Death Proof
summary_text: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

name: Ferry
summary_text: A ruthless Ferry Bouman is sent to his native region of Brabant by his boss Brink to avenge an attack on their gang. When he meets the lovely Danielle and old family feuds resurface, Brabant starts to pierce his steel armour.

name: Yes, God, Yes
summary_text: After an innocent AOL chat turns racy, a Catholic teenager in the early 00s discovers masturbating and struggles to suppress her new urges in the face of eternal damnation.

name: Don't Breathe Sequel
summary_text: The sequel is set in the years following the initial deadly home invasion, where Norman Nordstrom (Stephen Lang) lives in quiet solace until his past sins catch up to him.

name: X: First Class
summary_text: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

name: Moonlight
summary_text: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

name: Cloud Atlas
summary_text: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

name: Manchester by the Sea
summary_text: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

name: Rurouni Kenshin Part I: Origins
summary_text: A former assassin who has resolved to never kill again has his vow sorely tested.

name: The Bodyguard
summary_text: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an R&B singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

name: King of the Hill
summary_text: A straight-laced propane salesman in Arlen, Texas tries to deal with the wacky antics of his family and friends, while also trying to keep his son in line.

name: Hogan's Heroes
summary_text: The inmates of a German World War II prisoner of war camp conduct an espionage and sabotage campaign right under the noses of their warders.

name: This Means War
summary_text: C.I.A. operatives wage an epic battle on each other when they discover they are dating the same woman.

name: Holler
summary_text: To pay for her education, and the chance of a better life, a young woman joins a dangerous scrap metal crew.

name: The Secret Life of Us
summary_text: 20-30 somethings living in St Kilda and their dramas in life.

name: Casablanca
summary_text: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
summary_text: Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.

name: The Pursuit of Love
summary_text: Based on the novel by Nancy Mitford.

name: The Equalizer
summary_text: A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.

name: Sherlock Holmes
summary_text: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

name: National Lampoon's Vacation
summary_text: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
summary_text: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

name: Revolutionary Road
summary_text: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
summary_text: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

name: Collateral
summary_text: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

name: The Wheel of Time
summary_text: Set in a high fantasy world where magic exists, but only some can access it, a woman named Moiraine embarks on a dangerous, world-spanning journey with five young men and women. Based on the book series by Robert Jordan.

name: To Your Eternity
summary_text: A lonely boy wandering the Arctic regions of North America meets a wolf, and the two become fast friends, depending on each other to survive the harsh environment. But the boy has a history, and the wolf is more than meets the eye as well.

name: Rocky
summary_text: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

name: Marriage Story
summary_text: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

name: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
summary_text: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

name: Now You See Me
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

name: Clash of the Titans
summary_text: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

name: Black-ish
summary_text: A family man struggles to gain a sense of cultural identity while raising his kids in a predominantly white, upper-middle-class neighborhood.

name: Trigger Point
summary_text: Follows Nicolas Shaw, a retired U.S. special operative who becomes part of an elite "invisible" team that quietly takes out the worst villains around the world.

name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
summary_text: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

name: Strange But True
summary_text: A woman surprises the family of her deceased boyfriend by telling them she's pregnant with his child.

name: Flight
summary_text: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
summary_text: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

name: High School DxD
summary_text: After being killed on his first date, idiotic and perverted Issei Hyodo is resurrected as a demon by Rias Gremory only to be recruited into her club of high-class devils.

name: Halifax: Retribution
summary_text: A sniper is on the loose, as Jane Halifax comes back to the rescue to find the sniper before its too late. 20 years on the race for answers is more important than ever.

name: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
summary_text: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

name: Wrong Turn
summary_text: Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.

name: Dances with Wolves
summary_text: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

name: The Terror
summary_text: Supernatural, semihistorical, horror anthology series, where each season is inspired by a different infamous or mysterious real life historical tragedy.

name: Sneaky Pete
summary_text: A con man on the run from a vicious gangster takes cover by assuming the identity of his prison cellmate, Pete, reuniting with his estranged family, that threatens to drag him into a world just as dangerous as the one he's escaping.

name: The Cable Guy
summary_text: A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

name: Godless
summary_text: In the 1880s American West, murderous outlaw gang leader Frank Griffin hunts for ex-protege Roy Goode. Frank's chase leads him to La Belle, New Mexico--a town inhabited, after a mining disaster, almost entirely by women.

name: Batman: The Animated Series
summary_text: The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City with occasional help from Robin and Batgirl.

name: Trollhunters: Rise of the Titans
summary_text: The heroes from the Trollhunters series team-up on an epic adventure to fight the Arcane Order for control over the magic that binds them all.

name: The Bourne Identity
summary_text: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

name: Good Boys
summary_text: Three 6th grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying accidentally stolen drugs, being hunted by teenage girls, and trying to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party.

name: Spy
summary_text: A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.

name: Gods of Egypt
summary_text: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

name: Blue Velvet
summary_text: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

name: Brazil
summary_text: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

name: Batman & Robin
summary_text: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

name: Cruel Intentions
summary_text: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

name: Devil's Island
summary_text: A young woman inherits a small island in New York and discovers it has a dangerous history.

name: The Babysitter
summary_text: When Cole stays up past his bedtime, he discovers that his hot baby sitter belongs to a satanic cult that will stop at nothing to keep him quiet.

name: Endangered Species
summary_text: Jack Halsey takes his wife, their adult kids, and a friend for a dream vacation in Kenya. But as they venture off alone into a wilderness park, their safari van is flipped over by an angry rhino, leaving them injured and desperate.

name: Mad Max
summary_text: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

name: Zach Stone Is Gonna Be Famous
summary_text: After recently graduating high school, young Zach Stone opts out of a college to pursue the New American Dream: becoming famous with no talent whatsoever.

name: Heathers
summary_text: At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jocks dominate and all the popular girls are named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and mysterious new kid to give teen angst a body count.

name: Dr. Death
summary_text: As patients entering the operating room of Dr. Christopher Duntsch for routine spinal surgeries start leaving permanently maimed or dead, two fellow surgeons and a young Assistant District Attorney set out to stop him.

name: Lady Bird
summary_text: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

name: There's Something About Mary
summary_text: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

name: Liar Liar
summary_text: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

name: Sausage Party
summary_text: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

name: Top of the Lake
summary_text: Obsessed with the disappearance of a 12-year-old pregnant girl near a freezing lake in New Zealand, a brave detective will find herself up against small-town secrets and a side of herself that was meticulously kept at bay.

name: Event Horizon
summary_text: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

name: Rebecca
summary_text: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

name: Mary Poppins Returns
summary_text: A few decades after her original visit, Mary Poppins, the magical nanny, returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

name: Wild Things
summary_text: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

name: Wanted
summary_text: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

name: An American Werewolf in London
summary_text: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

name: Red Sparrow
summary_text: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

name: Shrek 2
summary_text: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

name: Mank
summary_text: 1930's Hollywood is reevaluated through the eyes of scathing social critic and alcoholic screenwriter Herman J. Mankiewicz as he races to finish the screenplay of Citizen Kane (1941).

name: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
summary_text: She-Ra, Princess of Power, leads a rebellion to free her land of Etheria from the monstrous invaders the Horde.

name: Crisis
summary_text: Set against the backdrop of the opioid epidemic, stories of an undercover cop, a professor, and a grieving mother collide in this dramatic thriller from writer/director Nicholas Jarecki.

name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
summary_text: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

name: The Legend of Tarzan
summary_text: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

name: The Evil Dead
summary_text: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

name: Desperado
summary_text: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

name: Scent of a Woman
summary_text: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

name: Indori Ishq
summary_text: The story begins with amusing attempts of twelfth-grader, Kunal, to woo his classmate, Tara. Kunal finally manages to propose to Tara and their love story begins. After his schooling, Kunal...                See full summary »

name: The NeverEnding Story
summary_text: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

name: The Reader
summary_text: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

name: Independence Day: Resurgence
summary_text: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

name: Us Again
summary_text: An elderly couple regain their youth in the rain.

name: 8 Mile
summary_text: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

name: The Last Man on Earth
summary_text: Almost two years after a virus wiped out most of the human race, Phil Miller only wishes for some company, but soon gets more than he bargained for when that company shows up in the form of other survivors.

name: Home Improvement
summary_text: The daily trials and tribulations of Tim "The Tool Man" Taylor, a television show host raising three mischievous boys with help from his loyal co-host, loving wife, and eccentric neighbor.

name: Lie to Me
summary_text: About Cal Lightman, the world's leading deception expert who studies facial expressions and involuntary body language to expose the truth behind the lies.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
summary_text: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

name: Transformers: The Last Knight
summary_text: A deadly threat from Earth's history reappears and a hunt for a lost artifact takes place between Autobots and Decepticons, while Optimus Prime encounters his creator in space.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
summary_text: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

name: The Neon Demon
summary_text: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

name: Harrow
summary_text: Harrow tells the story of Dr. Daniel Harrow, a forensic pathologist with a total disregard for authority.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
summary_text: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

name: Father of the Bride
summary_text: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

name: Juno
summary_text: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding the unborn child.

name: Before Sunrise
summary_text: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

name: Genius
summary_text: The life stories of history's greatest minds. From their days as young adults to their final years we see their discoveries, loves, relationships, causes, flaws and genius.

name: Beautiful Boy
summary_text: Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.

name: Late Night
summary_text: A late night talk show host suspects that she may soon lose her long-running show.

name: The Help
summary_text: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Warehouse 13
summary_text: Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.

name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
summary_text: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

name: Sexify
summary_text: To build an innovative sex app and win a tech competition, a sexually inexperienced student and her friends must explore the daunting world of intimacy.

name: 500 Days of Summer
summary_text: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

name: Tomb Raider
summary_text: Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared.

name: The Manchurian Candidate
summary_text: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

name: Up
summary_text: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

name: Mandy
summary_text: The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

name: Cape Fear
summary_text: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

name: Sweet Magnolias
summary_text: Three South Carolina women, best friends since high school, shepherd one another through the complexities of romance, career, and family.

name: No Strings Attached
summary_text: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

name: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
summary_text: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2018 film 'Aquaman.'

name: Don Jon
summary_text: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

name: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
summary_text: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

name: Siberia
summary_text: An exploration into the language of dreams.

name: Rush Hour
summary_text: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
summary_text: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man she was once involved with.

name: Ms Fisher's Modern Murder Mysteries
summary_text: In swinging 60's Melbourne, gorgeously reckless Peregrine Fisher inherits a windfall when the famous aunt she never knew goes missing over the highlands of New Guinea.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
summary_text: The monstrous spirit of a slain child murderer seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

name: Hanna
summary_text: In equal parts high-concept thriller and coming-of-age drama, HANNA follows the journey of an extraordinary young girl raised in the forest, as she evades the relentless pursuit of an off-book CIA agent and tries to unearth the truth behind who she is.

name: The Pacific
summary_text: The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.

name: White Chicks
summary_text: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson sisters from a kidnapping plot.

name: Children of Men
summary_text: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

name: Hackers
summary_text: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

name: Condor
summary_text: A brilliant, young, idealistic CIA analyst finds himself in the middle of a conspiracy that kills everyone else at his office. Can he, with no field experience, stay alive long enough to get to the bottom of it?

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
summary_text: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

name: When They See Us
summary_text: Five teens from Harlem become trapped in a nightmare when they're falsely accused of a brutal attack in Central Park. Based on the true story.

name: Trolls World Tour
summary_text: When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.

name: A Rainy Day in New York
summary_text: A young couple arrives in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.

name: Take Me Home Tonight
summary_text: Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

name: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
summary_text: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns, she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's, "I love you."

name: Cowboy Bebop
summary_text: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
summary_text: A Tokyo college student is attacked by a ghoul, a superpowered human who feeds on human flesh. He survives, but has become part ghoul and becomes a fugitive on the run.

name: 300: Rise of an Empire
summary_text: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

name: Breach
summary_text: On the cusp of fatherhood, a junior mechanic aboard an interstellar ark to New Earth must outwit a malevolent cosmic terror intent on using the spaceship as a weapon.

name: Life
summary_text: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

name: The Mist
summary_text: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

name: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
summary_text: When Jacob (Asa Butterfield) discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

name: Walk a Crooked Mile
summary_text: During the Cold War, at a California atomic research plant, an FBI agent and a Scotland Yard inspector join forces to eliminate a foreign nuclear spy ring operating in the USA and the UK.

name: The Last Airbender
summary_text: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

name: Brightburn
summary_text: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

name: Cougar Town
summary_text: Follows the escapades and relationships of a group of neighbors living in Gulfhaven, Florida.

name: RuPaul's Drag Race
summary_text: RuPaul searches for America's next drag superstar.

name: The Young Savages
summary_text: A D.A. investigates 3 white teenagers accused of murdering a blind Puerto Rican kid.

name: Dark Shadows
summary_text: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

name: Cowboys & Aliens
summary_text: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

name: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
summary_text: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

name: Episodes
summary_text: A couple of British TV producers move to Hollywood to export their most popular series, and find it is not what they expected.

name: NYPD Blue
summary_text: Detectives from NYPD's 15th Precinct investigate homicides within their precinct.

name: Straight Outta Compton
summary_text: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles, California, in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes Hip Hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

name: Runaway
summary_text: In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

name: Under the Skin
summary_text: A mysterious young woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. However, events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.

name: Quantum Leap
summary_text: During a government experiment into time travel, a scientist finds himself trapped in the past, "leaping" into the bodies of different people on a regular basis and sorting out their problems whilst trying to get back home to his own time.

name: The Guest
summary_text: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

name: Reno 911!
summary_text: An irreverent look at what goes on behind-the-scenes in Reno, Nevada's Sheriff's Department.

name: Jackie Brown
summary_text: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

name: 13 Going on 30
summary_text: A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.

name: Designing Women
summary_text: The misadventures of four women and their handyman running a design firm in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Hot Rod
summary_text: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.

name: Madam Secretary
summary_text: A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.

name: Signs
summary_text: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

name: The Addams Family
summary_text: The misadventures of a blissfully macabre but extremely loving family.

name: Amélie
summary_text: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

name: Victoria
summary_text: The early life of Queen Victoria, from her ascension to the throne at the tender age of eighteen to her courtship and marriage to Prince Albert.

name: The Lord of the Rings
summary_text: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

name: Elite Short Stories: Nadia Guzmán
summary_text: Nadia feels conflicted about whether or not to see her long distance boyfriend, Guzmán, when she returns to Spain for her sister's wedding.

name: Layer Cake
summary_text: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

name: The Addams Family
summary_text: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

name: Unfaithful
summary_text: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

name: Truth Be Told
summary_text: A true-crime podcaster tries to solve the mystery surrounding a family patriarch's death.

name: Marcella
summary_text: Marcella Backland left the Metropolitan Police for the sake of her family, only to have her husband leave her. She returns to her job on the murder squad, investigating a case that seems disturbingly familiar to her.

name: Smokey and the Bandit
summary_text: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

name: Sense and Sensibility
summary_text: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

name: Unbreakable
summary_text: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

name: RED
summary_text: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

name: GLOW
summary_text: A look at the personal and professional lives of a group of women who perform for a wrestling organization in Los Angeles during the 1980s.

name: 12 Monkeys
summary_text: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary_text: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from a gang of criminal ninjas.

name: Face/Off
summary_text: To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery to assume the identity of the criminal mastermind who murdered his only son, but the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.

name: Back to the Future Part II
summary_text: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

name: The Mighty Ducks
summary_text: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

name: Gifted
summary_text: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.
